item.title: Linqable
item.description: Linqable is an easy way to create engaging URL previews from every link - even when the underlying site does not provide the necessary metadata.
item.content:
Linqable is an easy way to create engaging URL previews from every link - even when the underlying site does not provide the necessary metadata. NoEmbed strives to be smart, fast, and WYSIWYG - there are no hidden ads, or suspicious analytics on behalf of end users. API consumers get only what they paid for - engaging URL previews.

Linqable: ⚡️ fast and engaging link previews
Linqable turns URLs into beautiful and engaging previews. Using a combination of smart extraction techniques, it finds and extracts as much information about the provided URL as possible.
https://linqable.pro |
